segment.source: IEAK 11 - Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 Users Guide
segment.target: IEAK 11 - Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 Users Guide

segment.source: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administrator's Guide (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administrator's Guide (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administrator's Guide

segment.source: Use this guide to learn about the several options and processes you'll need to consider while you're using the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to customize, deploy, and manage Internet Explorer 11 for your employee's devices.
segment.target: Use this guide to learn about the several options and processes you'll need to consider while you're using the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to customize, deploy, and manage Internet Explorer 11 for your employee's devices.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Because this content isn't intended to be a step-by-step guide, not all of the steps are necessary.
segment.target: Because this content isn't intended to be a step-by-step guide, not all of the steps are necessary.

segment.source: IEAK 11 users
segment.target: IEAK 11 users

segment.source: IEAK 11 includes programs and tools that enterprises can use to customize, deploy, and administer Internet Explorer 11 for employee devices, while Internet service and content providers can use the same programs and tools to customize, deploy, and administer Internet Explorer 11 for customers.
segment.target: IEAK 11 includes programs and tools that enterprises can use to customize, deploy, and administer Internet Explorer 11 for employee devices, while Internet service and content providers can use the same programs and tools to customize, deploy, and administer Internet Explorer 11 for customers.

segment.source: IEAK 11 works in network environments, with or without Microsoft Active Directory service.
segment.target: IEAK 11 works in network environments, with or without Microsoft Active Directory service.

segment.source: Naming conventions
segment.target: Naming conventions

segment.source: IE11 and IEAK 11 offers differing experiences between Windows 7 and Windows 8.1 Update and newer versions of the Windows operating system:
segment.target: IE11 and IEAK 11 offers differing experiences between Windows 7 and Windows 8.1 Update and newer versions of the Windows operating system:

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: IE
segment.target: IE

segment.source: The immersive browser, or IE, without a specific version.
segment.target: The immersive browser, or IE, without a specific version.

segment.source: Internet Explorer for the desktop
segment.target: Internet Explorer for the desktop

segment.source: The desktop browser.
segment.target: The desktop browser.

segment.source: This is the only experience available when running IE11 on Windows 7 SP1.
segment.target: This is the only experience available when running IE11 on Windows 7 SP1.

segment.source: IE11
segment.target: IE11

segment.source: The whole browser, which includes both IE and Internet Explorer for the desktop.
segment.target: The whole browser, which includes both IE and Internet Explorer for the desktop.

segment.source: Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11
segment.target: Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11

segment.source: Step-by-step wizard screens that help you create custom IE11 installation packages.
segment.target: Step-by-step wizard screens that help you create custom IE11 installation packages.
